title: War On Terror
description:
War on Terror is a real-time strategy game which lets the player assume control of an international anti-terror unit, facing heavily armed terrorist groups in various troubled areas (America, Europe, and Asia). With 60 different units featuring 70+ skills, tactical management is the key to progress through the game, dealing with the controversial war on terrorism.

    * Real world settings, believable story line
    * 3 Different factions for a varied gameplay: World Forces, Chinese Forces & Terrorists
    * Control a total of 60 different and specialized units: Infantry, vehicles, armoured combat vehicles, artillery, helicopters, air support and special units
    * Cutting Edge 3D Technology: Providing the game with natural looking landscapes, water displays, beautiful dynamic lighting and shadow effects
    * Rich Single Player Experience: 3 separate campaigns and a total of 26 missions; ranging from assault to defensive and counterattack
    * Gain experience: Through accomplishing objectives, units can upgrade to a higher level
    * Call reinforcements: control a drop zone and spend mission points to call new units
    * Army Management: Before each mission, organize your army and choose the units you'll go to war with
    * Deep Multiplayer Gaming Experience: 20 multiplayer maps are open to battle for up to 8 players with 6 different modes
    * Map and Mission Editor: Design your own single and multiplayer maps 


Language: rus-subs
